attributes.action: Make self employed grants available to all self employed people
attributes.additional_details: I have personally not received any help financially being self employed as I became self employed in 2019 after the new tax year started and I know there are millions of people who are in the same situation. I would like to get this changed so all self employed people receive some kind of financial support.
attributes.background: Provide the same grants to the self employed people who became self employed after 2019.
